column4: for someone looking to make a career in linux sys admin, is the Ubuntu Certified Professional cert worth it?
being completely biased, at the moment, no
what would be a good cert or if not any cert, then what would be a good starting place? mind you i am finishing my MBA...but i really want to work with linux

I'm biased because every shop seems to be using redhat, or at least centos atm. at some point ubuntu will probably dent that if it hasn't already. I guess lots of it depends on where you want to work though. this is really fodder for #ubuntu-offtopic though :-)
